alert.note: Alert for Central Arctic Plains (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 04 at 12:20PM AKST until January 05 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Central Arctic Plains north of Sagwon. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Blowing snow will cause whiteout conditions. Large snow drifts will form. Wind chills to 50 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
